question: How do I install a package from the AUR?

golden_answer.summary: Clone the AUR package repository with git, review the PKGBUILD, then build and install using makepkg -si.
steps: Install base development tools: sudo pacman -S --needed base-devel git
Navigate to build directory: cd ~/builds (or create one: mkdir -p ~/builds)
Clone the AUR package: git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/<package-name>.git
CRITICAL: Review PKGBUILD for security: cat PKGBUILD or nano PKGBUILD
warnings: ALWAYS review PKGBUILD before building - AUR packages are user-submitted and not officially verified
Check package comments on AUR website for known issues
Consider using an AUR helper like yay or paru for easier updates, but still review PKGBUILDs
